Nokia will contribute its mapping technology to Microsoft's Bing search engine-- and integrate its application and content store into the Microsoft Marketplace. Nokia also will contribute its expertise on hardware design, language support, and help bring Windows Phone to a larger range of price points, market segments and geographies, according to a Microsoft news release.
